task.title: Setting Up the Power Supply
task.shortdesc: How to properly set up the power for the TRS-80 Expansion Interface.

context.note: Install the expansion DC power supply first.

step.cmd: Remove the Power Supply Door (top right side).
Connect one DC power cord (DIN connector) to the Power connector on the PCB.
Install the two DC Power Supplies as illustrated.

fig.title: Power Supplies and Future Expansion PCB Locations

step.cmd: Route the remaining cords out the rear of the case. Be sure the power cords are seated in the door cutouts before replacing the Door.
